content:
Hey people, I wonder if one of you knows a trick to get translations automated into locale module's db tables (locales_source/locales_target) when updating. They need to have a translation context, too.

This issue describes a bit, why I need it: https://github.com/backdrop-contrib/i18n/issues/33

Migration path from D7 路 Issue #33 路 backdrop-contrib/i18n
These modules need a migration path, as functionality made it into core (or has gone or changed significantly). i18n_user i18n_block i18n_variable i18n_taxonomy i18n_menu i18n_user Now in core (use...
